tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Thank you for being such a kind and thoughtful voice when we needed it most. We had lots of ups and downs during my pregnancy but you always encouraged and guided us in each and every phase. We thank you for all the patience and compassion you had shown during my journey.  Truly appreciate it.  #BestGynecologist

context: Prenatal Checkup,Labor and Delivery,Pregnant Women Counseling,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
I want to thank you doctor for being a guide & friend throughout my pregnancy and delivering to me a bundle of joy on 10th of April, 2022.  
Even after a emergency c section (post 14-16 hrs of labor) , I recovered smoothly in a matter of 2 weeks .. thank you for being there just a call/ msg away for any doubts or issues I had through the last 9 months. 
I highly recommend Dr. Monika especially to first time mothers..

** ****** ** * ***** ******* ************* She is a patient listener, ************ ************* and committed professional. She cares for her patients across the 24-hour and during critical period. She has wonderfully consulted the patient during covid-19 pandemic.
reply_text: Thanks a lot fr ur kind words ! üôè

review: blessed to have her during covid lock down...she guide us on almost everything...very polite and genuine...she handled my complicated twin pregnancy so easily... always recommend!!!
